subject: Design
title: The Bic Pen: Disposable Perfection
description: A quick win: understand The Bic Pen: Disposable Perfection.

hook.text: The Bic Cristal pen has sold 100 billion units since 1950. It's the most successful product design in history.

buildup.text: Marcel Bich spent two years perfecting the ballpoint mechanism to write smoothly without leaking.

discovery.text: The hexagonal barrel prevents rolling, the clear body shows ink levels, and the vented cap prevents choking.

twist.text: The pen is in MoMA's permanent collection. A disposable object became a design masterpiece.

climax.text: The Bic pen proves great design isn't about luxury â€” it's about solving problems elegantly at scale.

punchline.text: The greatest designed object costs 30 cents.

quiz.question: Why does the Bic Cristal pen have a hexagonal barrel?
